data.title: Girl's Day

data.text:
Girl's Day Members Profile 2017: Girl's Day Facts, Girl's Day Ideal Type

Girl's Day consists of 4 members. The band debuted in 2010, under Dream Tea Entertainment.

Girl's Day Fandom Name: DAI5Y (Daisy)

Girl's Day Official Fan Color: –

Girl's Day Official Accounts:

Facebook: dai5y.gsd

Twitter: @girls_day

Fan Cafe: Girlsday5

Girl's Day Members Profile:

Sojin

Stage Name: Sojin

Birth Name: Park So Jin

Position: Leader, Lead Vocalist

Birth Date: May 21, 1986

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Height: 167 cm (5'6″)

Blood Type: AB

Sojin facts:

– She was born in Daegu, South Korea.

– Education: Lee Hyun Elementary School, Seojin Middle School, Kyungduk Girls' High School, Yeungnam University (Major in Mechanical Engineering)

– Before debuting, she was a vocal trainer for the K-pop boy band Ulala Session.

– She was part of the initial members and debuted with Girl's Day in 2010.

– In January 2011, Sojin released her first solo single "Our Love Like This", which was the OST for the "Flames of Desire" Korean drama.

– Sojin composed Girl's Day' songs "Telepathy", "Girl's Day World", "Let's Go" and co-wrote the lyrics for "I Don't Mind".

– She also helped composing the song "It's Snowing" for Tokyo Girl.

– She loves cleaning, browsing YouTube for interesting videos, shopping, and eating snacks

– She is good at playing the piano and calligraphy

– There was a gossip about EXO's D.O. and Sojin being a couple, but there wasn't an official confirmation, it was only a gossip.

– Sojin's ideal type: "I like the kind of men who are thoughtful, but are still a little stubborn. I don't really look at appearance. If I do, I like people with big mouths. I also usually look at their eyes/gaze. Height doesn't matter at all."

Yura

Stage Name: Yura

Birth Name: Kim Ah Young

Position: Main Rapper, Lead Dancer, Vocalist, Visual

Birth Date: November 6, 1992

Zodiac Sign: Scorpio

Height: 170 cm (5'7″)

Blood Type: O

Yura facts:

– Yura was born in Ulsan, South Korea.

– Education: Ulsan Art High School (Dance major), Dongduk Women's University (alongside Minah)

– She loves dancing and listening to music.

– She's good at painting.

– According to "One Fine Day", Yura's height is now 170 cm (5'7″).

– In 2014, Yura joined "We Got Married", where she was paired with actor Hong Jong Hyun.

– Yura acted in "Secret Angel" (2012), "To the Beautiful You" (2012, cameo), "Be Arrogant" (2014), "Hip Hop Teacher" (2017)

– In 2016, Yura was chosen as an MCs for "Tasty Road", in 2017, she was chosen as one of the new MCs for "Life Bar", in 2017 she was also chosen as cast member of the show "Insolent Housemates".

– Yura's ideal type: a man who is attentive, has sense of humor and likes her. She mentioned before Lee Seung Gi as her ideal type.

Minah

Stage Name: Minah

Birth Name: Bang Min Ah

Position: Main Vocalist, Face of the Group

Birth Date: May 13, 1993

Zodiac Sign: Taurus

Height: 165 cm (5'5″)

Blood Type: O

Minah facts:

– She was born in Incheon, South Korea.

– Minah has an older sister, which is also an idol – Wanna.B's Linah.

– Education: Jinsun Girls' High School, Dongduk Women's University (majoring in Broadcasting)

– She was part of the initial members and debuted with Girl's Day in 2010.

– Minah was a cast member of "Law of the Jungle" season 5 (2015).

– In March, 2015, Minah made her solo debut with the album "I Am a Woman Too".

– She's good at playing the piano and impersonating Lena Park.

– Minah acted in the dramas: "Vampire Idol" (2012), "Family" (2012), "Master's Sun" (2013 -ep. 2), "My Sweet Family" (2015), "Beautiful Gong Shim" (2016).

– She also acted in the movies "Holly" (2013), "Dad for Rent" (2014).

– Minah is friends with Hotshot's/JBJ's Noh Taehyun.

– Minah's ideal type: she said D.O (EXO) is her Ideal type.

Yeri

Stage Name: Hyeri

Birth Name: Lee Hye Ri

Position: Main Dancer, Vocalist, Face of the Group, Maknae

Birth Date: June 9, 1994

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Height: 167 cm (5'6″)

Blood Type: AB

Hyeri facts:

– She was born in Gwangju, South Korea.

– She has a younger sister, Hye-rim (2 years younger).

– Hyeri was scouted by Dream Tea Entertainment when she was in middle school.

– Education: Seoul School of Performing Arts, Konkuk University (Film major)

– Hyeri joined Girl's Day in September 2010, alongside Yura, when Jiin and Jisun left the group.

– Hyeri acted in the dramas: "Tasty Life" (2012), "Seonam Girls High School Investigators " (2014), "Hyde Jekyll, Me" (2015), "Reply 1988" (2016), "Entertainer" (2016).

– She also acted in the movie "Strange Object" (2017).

– She likes watching movies and reading books.

– She's good at running marathons and writing.

– In 2016, on the Lunar New Year, Hyeri donated ₩50 million to Community Chest of Korea in order to help improving elderly welfare.

– Hyeri was in a relationship with H.O.T's member Tony An (started in March 2013) but they broke up after 8 months.

– Hyeri's ideal type: a man who can take good care of her.

FORMER MEMBERS:

Jisun

Stage Name: Jiin went on to join Bebop in 2014, but left in 2016.

Birth Name: Hwang Jisun

Position: Vocalist

Birthday: October 17, 1989

Zodiac Sign: Libra

Height: 165 cm (5'5″)

Weight: 45 kg (99 lbs)

Blood Type: A

Jisun facts:

– Her hobbies are stretching, reading, dancing.

– Education: Keukdong College

– She left Girl's Day in September 2010.

– Jisun joined New F.O in 2011 but the group disbanded.

Jiin

Stage Name: Jiin

Real Name: Lee Jiin

Position: Main Vocalist

Birthday: March 13, 1992

Zodiac Sign: Pisces

Height: 167 cm (5'6″)

Weight: 45 kg (99 lbs)

Blood Type: O

Jiin facts:

– Her hobbies are cooking, listening to music, watching movies.

– Education: Anyang Art High School

– She left Girl's Day in September 2010.

– Jiin went on to join Bebop in 2014 but left in 2016.

Jihae

Stage Name: Jihae

Birth Name: Woo Ji Hae

Position: Main Dancer, Rapper

Birthday: May 14, 1989

Zodiac Sign: Taurus

Height: 163 cm (5'4″)

Blood Type: B
